entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Hart Island
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:56 AM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Hart Island 10:00 AM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High 11.

entry.title: Friday: Rain or freezing rain. High plus 5 with temperature falling to zero in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning in the morning then changing to freezing rain late in the afternoon. Fog patches developing in the morning and dissipating late in the afternoon. Rainfall amount 10 mm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the afternoon. High plus 5 with temperature falling to zero in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 16 February 2023
